channel.title: DevOps on Adam Dingman
channel.description: Recent content in DevOps on Adam Dingman

item.title: Deploy an AWS Budget using Pulumi
item.description: What is Pulumi? Pulumi is yet another Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tool for deploying infrastructure using declaritive language which offers you the ability to pick your language of choice amongst TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Go, .NET, Java, and YAML to define your infrastructure. How am I using Pulumi? I really wanted a quick and easy means to get a feel for the basic structure of a Pulumi project and to get a feel for the CLI.
